price: Your only allies are Allah, His Messenger, and those believers who establish prayer and give zakah with humble submission.
arabic: إِنَّمَا وَلِيُّكُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُمۡ رَٰكِعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innamā waliyyukumu al-lahu warasūluhu wa-alladhīna āmanū alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wayu'tūna al-zakata wahum rākiʿūna
